headline: IFF Pharma Solutions to Showcase Plant-Based Dietary Supplement Ingredients and Technical Expertise at Vitafoods™ Europe 2025
summary: NEW YORK, April 22, 2025--IFF (NYSE: IFF) Pharma Solutions is excited to announce its participation at Vitafoods™ Europe 2025, the premier global nutraceutical event. The team will showcase its cutting-edge dietary supplement plant-based ingredients portfolio of innovative and trusted brands including SeaGel®, VERDIGEL™ SC, GRINDSTED® Pectin Premium, Ac-Di-Sol®, Avicel®, Accelerate®, and METHOCEL™ in hall 4 at booth 4F25, May 20-22, at the Fira Barcelona Gran Via.

content.title: IFF Pharma Solutions to Showcase Plant-Based Dietary Supplement Ingredients and Technical Expertise at Vitafoods™ Europe 2025
